title: Petrified Eye
subtitle: A fossilized eye of unknown origin

pages.content:
The §5Petrified Eye§r is just a crafting ingredient used to create a §5Awakened Eye§r.
You can find §5Petrified Eyes§r only in §5Mysterious Stone§r who generate in the deepslate.

To transform a §5Petrified Eye§r into an §5Awakened Eye§r, you must grind it on a §5Grindstone§r, but be careful, the process is delicate and requires precision.
